title: 0005 after 10 minutes rendering in FCP
message: Running FCP on this thing for 5 minutes the display atsrts to fuck up. Display shifts rght, jutters etc. This is a new chip 1617..... Slap another one on there or maybe something else?

title: 0005 after 10 minutes rendering in FCP
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 22346"]Reflow VRAM first.[/QUOTE]

OK I'll try that. I only have one 1617 left!

Do VRAM issues present the same as with bad GPU? I sorted a few no image cases by reballing the VRAM.

title: 0005 after 10 minutes rendering in FCP
message: Issues are the same, would it matter if the data lines to the VRAM are fucked on the GPU or VRAM end....no.
